hymn.title: Lord, the King of kings art Thou

layout.singingstanza: Lord, the King of kings art Thou, In Thy pre -- sence here we bow; God's a -- noint -- ed we a -- dore, Wor -- ship Thee in ho -- ly awe. Un -- to Thee, of kings the King, All the saints Thy prais -- es sing!

lyrics.stanza: Lord, the King of kings art Thou, In Thy presence here we bow; God's anointed we adore, Worship Thee in holy awe. Unto Thee, of kings the King, All the saints Thy praises sing!
Thine authority and pow'r Shall prevail from shore to shore! All shall serve and worship Thee In Thy kingly majesty! Unto Thee, of kings the King, All Thy praise shall ever ring!
Lord, Thy kingdom stands alone, And forever is Thy throne! To Thy glory and Thy pow'r We will sing forevermore! Now to Thee, of kings the King, All the saints Thy praises sing!
Gracious Lord, our sovereign King, Thy dear name we love to sing! O how sweet Thy reign and rule. May Thy kingdom come in full! Yet to Thee, of kings the King Here Thy praise we gladly sing!
